subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Adam Scott and Joe Durant held a three-shot lead over four other golfers at the Tour Championship on Friday. Scott has not been able to hoist a trophy of his own this year on the P.G.A. Tour.
snippet: Adam Scott and Joe Durant held a three-shot lead over four other golfers at the Tour Championship on Friday. Scott has not been able to hoist a trophy of his own this year on the P.G.A. Tour.
